name: Beefy Blasters
description:
Beefy Blasters is currently running a funding campaign on Kickstarter. If you want to support the game, click here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/funkanari/beefy-blasters

-- 

Beefy Blasters is a bara game featuring classic spaceshooter gameplay. We’re combining this with new, interactive  art visuals to create a fresh, sexy gaming experience.

Use your blasters to destroy enemy ships and to interact directly with hot guys. Blast your way through thick pecs and butts and make those men blush!

Every level features its own hunk. Unfortunately, he’s wearing waaaaaaay too many clothes. It’s your job is to blast away all that nasty fabric to reveal that chiseled bod underneath. Clear levels by freeing your smoldering hunk from his underwear prison, all while avoiding your own destruction by enemy ships!

As you progress through the game, you'll unlock more intimate hunk on hunk action. Later levels feature more intense scenes, all with different combinations of your favourite demon studs. 

----
